column1: Image:Golden_Perch_sign.jpg.The Golden Perch was an inn in the township of Stock
column2: north of Bucklebury near the eastern borders of the Shire. It was said by Peregrin Took to serve the best beer in the Eastfarthing. It was probably favoured by anglers hence the name.

column1: When the Travellers were leaving Hobbiton
column3: Peregrin Took insisted on making a "shortcut" to the Golden Perch.

column1: The name refers to the fish http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perch perch (and not wikipedia:Perch (unit) or http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/perch#Noun_2 bird-perch).
